alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 3:37PM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TUESDAY TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Highest amounts are expected away from the lakeshores, particularly across the higher terrain areas west and south of Marquette. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Marquette County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Tuesday to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute and will the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
